author: bencomic

right.text: And if one more person says I'm putting words in their mouth because they think they fucking know me, I'm just gonna leave them in the dust. Disappear.

left.text: I wasn't. I'm merely prepping the following statement: But whoever my friends are, I'm not losing any more as the last month or so has caused.

right.text: Hon, hon... I'm sorry. I didn't mean to do that. Forgive me. Please.

left.text: Because apparently everyone knows the intention behind my words, they know me so well and can determine what I actually meant when I said it right there.
I do forgive you. I've just heard those words quite a bit the last few days, and no one who's said it knows what they're talking about.

title: semantic fucking disassembly, part 6: oh, hon, hon
